summary: This mod replaces the Skyrim theme song with one that I made.
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to my unfinished music project. This mod was supposed to replace the theme music of Skyrim with a track that would take you on a journey through the sounds of all the previous Elder Scrolls games, but my hard drive died while working on it so this is all I have left. Watch the video to hear it before install. It may be unfinished, but is still less annoying than the huffing battle cries of nords shouting at you.

[youtube]izkc-kaQiAg[/youtube]

Install: Just unzip to your Skyrim 'Data' folder, then play!
Uninstall: Remove the file 'Data/music/special/mus_maintheme.xwm'

That's it, just a simple file. I may try to start this project over in the future, but don't hold your breath.
author: vwr
